summary: This document is a forwarded email from July 9, 2019, regarding a potential witness named Steven Goldfarb who contacted an office claiming to have information about Jeffrey Epstein. The email instructs the recipient to add Goldfarb's contact information to an FBI spreadsheet for follow-up.

persons.name: Steven Goldfarb
persons.context: An individual who identified himself as Steven Goldfarb claimed to have information about Jeffrey Epstein and provided his phone number for follow-up.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central figure about whom Steven Goldfarb claims to have information.

connections.description: Goldfarb claims to have information about Epstein, indicating he may have knowledge relevant to the investigation.

keyFacts: Steven Goldfarb contacted an office claiming to have information about Jeffrey Epstein.
The correspondence instructs the recipient to add Goldfarb's contact information to an FBI spreadsheet for follow-up.
